keyword: calories in baked potato with butter
title: Calories in Baked Potato with Butter
meta_description: Discover calories in baked potato with butter, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for your meal.
h1: Calories in Baked Potato with Butter
assumptions: Medium russet potato (173 g baked with skin), topped with 1 tbsp (14 g) salted butter; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by potato size, butter brand, baking method, and exact portions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A medium baked potato with 1 tbsp butter provides ~263 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

basis.label: per 1 medium baked potato with 1 tbsp butter

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged foods.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp sour cream instead of butter

faqs.q: How many calories in a baked potato with butter?
faqs.a: About 263 kcal for one medium potato with 1 tbsp butter.

faqs.q: What's the protein in baked potato with butter?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.4 g protein, mainly from the potato.

faqs.q: Does baking potato with skin affect calories?
faqs.a: No calorie change, but skin adds ~4.7 g fiber for better nutrition.

faqs.q: How much fat is in baked potato with butter?
faqs.a: About 11.7 g total fat, with 7.4 g saturated from the butter.

faqs.q: Can I reduce calories in baked potato with butter?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”skip butter for 161 kcal, or use a smaller potato (150 g) for ~240 kcal total.
